name: defend-order
effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user calls out
its underlings to
make a living shield,
raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user calls out
its underlings to
shield its body,
raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.
